amendment.description: To impose a limitation on Department of Defense contracting for performance of acquisition functions closely associated with inherently governmental functions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3305 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3305 proposed by Senator Wyden. (consideration: CR S6701-6703; text: CR S6701) To impose a limitation on Department of Defense contracting for performance of acquisition functions closely associated with inherently governmental functions.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3305 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3305 proposed by Senator Wyden.
